Description: Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, Bahari Dhow Beach Villas is located in Diani Beach, 2.1 mi from The Diani Beach Shopping Center. Colobus Conservation is 5.6 mi away.
Located on 38 acres of beachfront property, Diamonds Leisure Beach & Golf Resort features an 18-hole golf course overlooking the Indian Ocean.
Nestled in an indigenous coastal forest with a garden and a palm-fringed beach, The Sands at Nomad is located in Ukunda. It features an outdoor pool, a spa area and restaurants.
Soul Breeze Beach Resort, located on Diani Beach, features a restaurant and free WiFi. The area is popular for windsurfing, snorkeling and diving.
Pinewood Beach Resort and Spa is located on Galu Beach and 6.2 mi away from the Ukunda Airstrip. This boutique hotel features water sport facilities, an outdoor pool and restaurants.
Located in Diani Beach, a 2-minute walk from Diani Beach, The Zubeida Boutique Resort provides accommodations with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant.
Featuring a swimming pool, a garden, a terrace and views of the pool, Flametree Beach Homes is located in Diani Beach and has accommodations with free WiFi.
Set on Diani Beach, Papillon Lagoon Reef features an outdoor pool, beach bar and restaurant terrace all overlooking the Indian Ocean.
